mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.instance_id AS "instanceId", a.em_code AS "emCode", a.em_type AS "emType", a.proc_person AS "procPerson", a.repair_content AS "repairContent", a.repair_datetime AS "repairDatetime", a.end_flag AS "endFlag", a.enabled_flag AS "enabledFlag", a.version AS "version", a.updated_dt AS "updatedDt", a.updated_by AS "updatedBy", a.created_dt AS "createdDt", a.created_by AS "createdBy", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.com_code AS "comCode", a.modu_code AS "moduCode"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO em_process( id, instance_id, em_code, em_type, proc_person, repair_content, repair_datetime, end_flag, enabled_flag, version, updated_dt, updated_by, created_dt, created_by, remarks, com_code, modu_code ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{instanceId}, #{emCode}, #{emType}, #{procPerson}, #{repairContent}, #{repairDatetime}, #{endFlag}, #{enabledFlag}, #{version}, #{updatedDt}, #{updatedBy}, #{createdDt}, #{createdBy}, #{remarks}, #{comCode}, #{moduCode} )
mapper.update: UPDATE em_process SET instance_id = #{instanceId}, em_code = #{emCode}, em_type = #{emType}, proc_person = #{procPerson}, repair_content = #{repairContent}, repair_datetime = #{repairDatetime}, end_flag = #{endFlag}, enabled_flag = #{enabledFlag}, version = #{version}, updated_dt = #{updatedDt}, updated_by = #{updatedBy}, created_dt = #{createdDt}, created_by = #{createdBy}, remarks = #{remarks}, com_code = #{comCode}, modu_code = #{moduCode} WHERE id = #{id}
